sen.j: 豆乳（とうにゅう）は、ダイズを水に浸してすりつぶし、水を加えて煮つめ、かすを漉した飲料である。
sen.e: Soymilk is the beverage made by soaking soybean in the water, grinding them, adding water, boiling down, and filtering grounds.
Soymilk is a beverage made by soaking soybeans in water, grinding them, adding water, boiling the mixture down and filtering the grounds.
Soymilk is a beverage made by soaking soybeans in water, grinding them, adding water, boiling the mixture down and filtering the grounds.

sen.j: 豆乳は、牛乳に似た外観と食味がある。
sen.e: Soymilk has similar appearance and flavor to milk.
Soymilk has an appearance and flavor that are similar to milk.
Soymilk has an appearance and flavor that are similar to milk.

sen.j: そのままの豆乳には特有の青臭さがあり飲みづらいため、砂糖などで甘みを加えたものも販売されている。
sen.e: Plain soymilk has a particular raw smell and hard to drink, so soymilk sweetened with sugar is also sold.
Plain soymilk has a particularly raw smell and is hard to drink, so soymilk sweetened with sugar is also sold.
Plain soymilk has a particularly raw smell and is hard to drink, so soymilk sweetened with sugar is also sold.

sen.j: 中国語では豆漿（トウチャン dòujiāng）と表記する。
sen.e: It is written as 豆漿 (pronounce tochan) in Chinese.
It is written as 豆漿 (pronounced tochan) in Chinese.
It is written as 豆漿 (pronounced tochan) in Chinese.

sen.j: 中華文化圏では、朝食に、暖かい豆乳に砂糖を加えて飲んだり、これに油条と呼ばれる揚げパンを浸して食べる習慣がある。
sen.e: In Chinese cultural area, there is a custom that people drink hot soymilk with sugar for their breakfast and eat with fried bread called Yutiyao soaked in soymilk.
In regard to the Chinese culture, there is a custom of drinking hot soymilk with sugar for breakfast and eating fried bread called Yutiyao soaked in soymilk.
In regard to the Chinese culture, there is a custom of drinking hot soymilk with sugar for breakfast and eating fried bread called Yutiyao soaked in soymilk.

sen.j: また、豆乳に塩味の出汁を加え、浅葱と細かく切った油条を浮かべた鹹豆漿（シェントウチャン）は、朝粥感覚の「食べる豆乳」である。
sen.e: Also, 'edible soymilk' which is the sense of rice gruel in the morning, called Shentochan, is cooked by adding salted broth in soymilk and putting minced Yutiyao and chives on the top.
Also, 'edible soymilk,' which equates to rice gruel in the morning, called Shentochan, is cooked by adding salted broth to soymilk and putting minced Yutiyao and chives on top.
Also, 'edible soymilk,' which equates to rice gruel in the morning, called Shentochan, is cooked by adding salted broth to soymilk and putting minced Yutiyao and chives on top.

sen.j: もともと豆漿は華北を中心に飲まれていたが、1955年に台湾台北県永和市で開店した豆漿店、「世界豆漿大王」（現、新世界豆漿大王）が人気を集め、各地でチェーン展開した事によって、中華文化圏を代表する軽食として知られるようになった。
sen.e: Originally, people in north China used to drink Tochan, but when tochan shop, called 'World Tochan King' (present New World Tochan King), opened in Eiwa City, Taipei Prefecture, Taiwan, the shop became popular and opened chains in various locations, so it became known as snack representing Chinese cultural area.

Originally, people in northern China used to drink Tochan, but when a tochan shop called 'World Tochan King' (presently New World Tochan King), opened in Eiwa City, Taipei Prefecture, Taiwan, the shop became popular and opened chain stores in various locations, so it became known as a snack representing the Chinese cultural area.

Originally, people in northern China used to drink Tochan, but when a tochan shop called 'World Tochan King' (presently New World Tochan King), opened in Eiwa City, Taipei Prefecture, Taiwan, in 1955, the shop became popular and opened chain stores in various locations, so it became known as a snack representing the Chinese cultural area.

sen.j: 日本では、中国ほど一般的な飲み物ではないが、豆腐店の店頭などで、新鮮な豆乳が販売されている。
sen.e: In Japan, it is not so common beverage as in China, but fresh soymilk is sold over the counter of Tofu (bean curd) shop.
It's less common as a beverage than it is in China, but fresh soymilk is sold over the counters at tofu (bean curd) shops.
It's less common as a beverage than it is in China, but fresh soymilk is sold over the counters at tofu (bean curd) shops.

sen.j: 中国と台湾には大豆以外にリョクトウ、黒豆の豆乳もある。
sen.e: There is soymilk made from green bean and black bean other than soybean in China and Taiwan.
In China and Taiwan, soymilk is made from green beans and black beans in addition to soybeans.
In China and Taiwan, soymilk is made from green beans and black beans in addition to soybeans.

sen.j: 黒豆を用いた豆乳は日本でも製品化・販売されている。
sen.e: Soymilk made from black bean is also commercialized and sold in Japan.
Soymilk made from black beans is also commercialized and sold in Japan.
Soymilk made from black beans is also commercialized and sold in Japan.

sen.j: 工場で甘味料・香料・植物油などを加えて飲みやすい味に加工した「調製豆乳（ちょうせいとうにゅう）」も販売されている。
sen.e: Adjusted soymilk' which is processed to agreeable taste by adding sweetener, perfume material, and vegetable oil is also sold.
Adjusted soymilk,' which is processed to achieve an agreeable taste by adding sweetener, perfume material and vegetable oil, is also sold.
Adjusted soymilk,' which is processed to achieve an agreeable taste by adding sweetener, perfume material and vegetable oil, is also sold.

sen.j: 見かけ上変わりがないこのような製品と区別するため、普通のものに「無調整豆乳」と表記しているものもある。
sen.e: In order to distinguish it with these products which appearance is not so different, 'plain soymilk' is written on the ordinary one.
In order to distinguish such products, which aren't very different in appearance, 'plain soymilk' is printed on the ordinary product.
In order to distinguish such products, which aren't very different in appearance, 'plain soymilk' is printed on the ordinary product.

sen.j: 近年は大豆の青臭さを抑えられる製法が開発され、健康志向・自然志向も手伝って無調整豆乳の需要が増えている。
sen.e: The process that can control the raw smell of soybean has recently been developed, so demand for plain soymilk is increasing due in part to health and natural conscious.
A process for controlling the raw soybean odor has recently been developed, so the demand for plain soymilk is increasing due in part to the desire for healthful, natural products.
A process for controlling the raw soybean odor has recently been developed, so the demand for plain soymilk is increasing due in part to the desire for healthful, natural products.

sen.j: 日本国内の代表的な製造販売メーカーは、紀文フードケミファ・マルサンアイ・ソヤファームなど。
sen.e: The representative vendors in Japan are Kibun Food Chemifa Co., Ltd., Marusanai Co., Ltd., and Soyafarm Co., Ltd..
The representative vendors in Japan are Kibun Food Chemifa Co., Ltd., Marusanai Co., Ltd., and Soyafarm Co., Ltd.
The representative vendors in Japan are Kibun Food Chemifa Co., Ltd., Marusanai Co., Ltd., and Soyafarm Co., Ltd.

sen.j: かつては、三菱化学フーズも販売していた。
sen.e: Mitsubishi-Kagaku Foods Corporation used to sell soymilk.
Mitsubishi-Kagaku Foods Corporation used to sell soymilk.
Mitsubishi-Kagaku Foods Corporation used to sell soymilk.

sen.j: アメリカ合衆国ではEden Foods など。
sen.e: The representative vendor in the United States is Eden Foods, Inc..
The representative vendor in the United States is Eden Foods, Inc.
The representative vendor in the United States is Eden Foods, Inc.

sen.j: アメリカ合衆国ではダイエット食品としてバニラ味やチョコレート味が人気があり、日本でもダイエット食品として人気がある。
sen.e: In the United States, vanilla and chocolate tastes are popular as diet food, and it is also popular as diet food in Japan.
In the United States, vanilla and chocolate flavors are popular in diet foods, and it's also popular as a diet food in Japan.
In the United States, vanilla and chocolate flavors are popular in diet foods, and it's also popular as a diet food in Japan.

sen.j: 調製豆乳は、冷やして飲まれる事が多い。
sen.e: Adjusted soymilk is often served chilled.
Adjusted soymilk is often served chilled.
Adjusted soymilk is often served chilled.

sen.j: 日本では、紙パックの商品、プラスチックのパックまたは瓶に入った商品が多く販売されている。
sen.e: In Japan, many of the soymilk products are sold in cartons and plastic containers or bottles.
In Japan, many soymilk products are sold in cartons and plastic containers or bottles.
In Japan, many soymilk products are sold in cartons and plastic containers or bottles.

sen.j: 香港では、ビタソイという商品名の豆乳が瓶入りで売られて人気があったが、現在は紙パック入りの方が主流となり、瓶入りを扱っている店は減っている。
sen.e: In Hong Kong, the soymilk called Bitasoi used to be sold in the bottle and was popular, but the one in a carton became mainstream, so the shops selling soymilk in the bottle are decreasing.
In Hong Kong, the bottled soymilk called Bitasoi was popular, but the version in a carton became mainstream so fewer and fewer shops are selling soymilk in bottles.
In Hong Kong, the bottled soymilk called Bitasoi was popular, but the version in a carton became mainstream so fewer and fewer shops are selling soymilk in bottles.

sen.j: 中国では、砂糖を加えて乾燥させた、顆粒状のインスタント豆乳も販売されている。
sen.e: Granular instant soymilk, made by adding sugar and drying it, is also sold in China.
Granular instant soymilk, made by adding sugar and drying it, is also sold in China.
Granular instant soymilk, made by adding sugar and drying it, is also sold in China.

sen.j: 熱湯を加えれば、朝食に飲まれるような、暖かく、甘い豆乳となる。
sen.e: By adding hot water, it became hot and sweet soymilk that is like a drunk in the morning.
By adding hot water, it became hot-and-sweet soymilk that's enjoyed as a morning beverage.
By adding hot water, it became hot-and-sweet soymilk that's enjoyed as a morning beverage.

sen.j: 豆乳ににがりなどの凝固剤を加えて固めると豆腐となる。
sen.e: It becomes tofu when you add coagulant such as bittern in soymilk.
Soymilk becomes tofu when a coagulant such as bittern is added.
Soymilk becomes tofu when a coagulant such as bittern is added.

sen.j: 無調整豆乳の中には、豆腐ができると表示しているものもある。
sen.e: The labels for some adjusted soymilk say tofu can be made.
The labels for some adjusted soymilk state that tofu can be made.
The labels for some adjusted soymilk state that tofu can be made.

sen.j: 大豆から豆乳を絞った残りかすはおからと言う。
sen.e: Grounds that is squeezed soymilk from soybean is called Okara.
The soybean grounds squeezed from soymilk are called okara.
The soybean grounds squeezed from soymilk are called okara.

sen.j: 豆乳をじっくり加熱した時に、表面にできる薄皮を引き上げたものをゆば（湯葉・湯波）といい、おもに吸い物の具として使われたり、刺身と同様にそのまま醤油などをつけて食べたりする。
sen.e: When soymilk is slowly heated, thin skin pulled up from the surface is called yuba (tofu skin), and it is mainly used as ingredients in soup dishes and eaten as it is with soy sauce like eating raw fish.

When soymilk is slowly heated, the thin skin that's pulled up from the surface is called yuba (tofu skin), which is mainly used as an ingredient in soup dishes and eaten as it is with soy sauce, as one would eat raw fish.

When soymilk is slowly heated, the thin skin that's pulled up from the surface is called yuba (tofu skin), which is mainly used as an ingredient in soup dishes and eaten as it is with soy sauce, as one would eat raw fish.

sen.j: 牛乳の代わりに豆乳を使用したヨーグルト・チーズ・アイスクリームなどの加工食品も存在する。
sen.e: There are processed food products that soymilk is used instead of milk, such as yogurt, cheese, and ice cream.
There are processed food products that soymilk is used instead of milk, such as yogurt, cheese, and ice cream.
There are processed food products that soymilk is used instead of milk, such as yogurt, cheese, and ice cream.

sen.j: また、コーヒー、カフェ・オ・レ、カフェ・ラッテにおける牛乳の代わりに豆乳を用いたメニューも増えている（「ソイラテ」など）。
sen.e: Also for coffee, cafe au lait, and cafe latte, the items used soymilk instead of milk are increasing ('soy latte' etc.).
Also, for coffee, cafe au lait and cafe latte, increasingly items use soymilk instead of milk ('soy latte,' etc.).
Also, for coffee, cafe au lait and cafe latte, increasingly items use soymilk instead of milk ('soy latte,' etc.).

sen.j: 近年、日本では「豆乳鍋」などと呼ばれる、豆乳を使った料理の人気が高まっている。
sen.e: In recent years, cuisine uses soymilk called 'tonyu nabe' (soymilk one-pot dish) is growing in popularity.
In recent years, cuisine incorporating soymilk called 'tonyu nabe (soymilk one-pot dish)' has grown in popularity.
In recent years, cuisine incorporating soymilk called 'tonyu nabe' (soymilk one-pot dish) has grown in popularity.

sen.j: 出汁を加えた豆乳を用いて、野菜、肉、魚介類などを煮て食べる。
sen.e: It cooks vegetables, meat, and fish in soymilk with broth.
Vegetables, meat and fish can be cooked in soymilk with broth.
Vegetables, meat and fish can be cooked in soymilk with broth.

sen.j: 煮る内に、表面にゆばができたり、半分凝固したおぼろ豆腐のようなものができ、これらも食べる事ができる。
sen.e: Before cooking them in the pot, yuba appears on the surface, kind of oboro tofu (half curdled tofu that is being produced in the making of tofu) that is half curdled is formed, and these can also be eaten.
Before such ingredients are cooked in the pot, yuba appears on the surface and a kind of oboro tofu (half-curdled tofu produced in the making of tofu) is formed, and these can also be eaten.
While such ingredients are cooked in the pot, yuba appears on the surface and a kind of oboro tofu (half-curdled tofu produced in the making of tofu) is formed, and these can also be eaten.

sen.j: これ以外にも、牛乳を使う料理で、豆乳を代用にできるものも多い。
sen.e: Other than that, many cuisines by milk can also be substituted by soymilk.
Other than that, soymilk can substitute for milk in many dishes.
